      • Room

        public Room​(RoomType type,
            java.lang.String roomId,
            int floorNumber,
            int roomNumber,
            RoomStatus roomStatus,
            boolean isWifiEnabled,
            boolean isSmokingAllowed,
            double price)
        The constructor for the room
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the room
        roomId - id of the room
        floorNumber - floor number of the room
        roomNumber - room number of the room
        roomStatus - status of the room
        isWifiEnabled - whether is wifi enabled
        isSmokingAllowed - whether smoking is allowed
        price - the price of the room see RoomStatus for different status of the room see RoomType for different type of the room

      • Room

        public Room​(RoomType type,
            int floorNumber,
            int roomNumber,
            RoomStatus roomStatus,
            double price,
            boolean isWifiEnabled,
            boolean isSmokingAllowed)
        Constructor for the room
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the room
        floorNumber - Floor number of the room
        roomNumber - Room number of the room
        roomStatus - Status of the room
        price - Price of the room
        isWifiEnabled - whether the wifi is enabled in the room
        isSmokingAllowed - whether the smoking is allowed in the room see RoomStatus for different status of the room see RoomType for different type of the room
